conceptualization.name: Conceptualization
conceptualization.definition: Ideas, formulation or evolution of overarching research goals and aims.

data_curation.name: Data curation
data_curation.definition: Produce metadata, scrub data and maintain research data for initial use and later re-use.

formal_analysis.name: Formal analysis
formal_analysis.definition: Application of statistical, mathematical, computational, or other formal techniques to analyze data.

funding_acquisition.name: Funding acquisition
funding_acquisition.definition: Acquisition of the financial support for the project leading to this publication.

investigation.name: Investigation
investigation.definition: Conducting a research and investigation process, specifically performing the data collection.

methodology.name: Methodology
methodology.definition: Development or design of methodology; creation of models.

project_management.name: Project Management
project_management.definition: Management and coordination responsibility for the research activity planning and execution.

resources.name: Resources
resources.definition: Provision of study materials, instrumentation, computing resources, or other analysis tools.

software.name: Software
software.definition: Programming, software development; designing computer programs; implementation of the computer code and supporting algorithms.

supervision.name: Supervision
supervision.definition: Oversight for the research activity planning and execution, including mentorship external to the core team.

validation.name: Validation
validation.definition: Replication of results and other research outputs.

visualization.name: Visualization
visualization.definition: Preparation, creation and/or presentation of the published work, specifically data presentation.

writing_original.name: Writing – original draft
writing_original.definition: Preparation, creation and/or presentation of the published work, specifically writing the initial draft.

writing_review.name: Writing – review and editing
writing_review.definition: Critical review, commentary or revision – including pre- or post-publication stages.
